scripts.build:web: npm run build:shared && cd platforms/web && npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run dev:shared & npm run dev:web
scripts.dev:miniprogram: echo 'Use WeChat Developer Tools to develop miniprogram'
scripts.deploy:web: npm run build:web && echo 'Deploy web build to your hosting service'
scripts.deploy:miniprogram: echo 'Use WeChat Developer Tools to upload miniprogram'
scripts.clean: npm run clean:shared && npm run clean:web
scripts.clean:web: cd platforms/web && npm run build && rm -rf dist
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd shared && npm install && cd ../platforms/web && npm install
